sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a standard deck of 52 cards?
message_2:
There is only one King of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing the King of Hearts is 1 out of 52, which can be represented as a fraction or a percentage:

Fraction: 1/52
Percentage: (1/52) x 100% â‰ˆ 1.92%
